Shopify Link Grid Section

Learn how to create a Link Grid section with Sections Pro in Shopify

Description of the Section

The Link Grid section is a customizable and responsive layout for displaying various types of links in a grid format. This section supports text links, image links, and icon links, making it versatile and visually appealing for showcasing different types of content. With configurable properties, you can easily adjust the appearance to match your store's theme and requirements.

Demo of the Section

Installation Instructions

  1. Download the Sections Pro app on the Shopify App Store
  2. Open the app and navigate to Free Sections
  3. Search for "Link Grid"
  4. Click to Publish or Purchase

Sample Use Cases for a Shopify e-commerce store

  • Promotional Banners: Use the grid to display promotional banners with links to sales or special offers.
  • Category Navigation: Picture-based links for various product categories to enhance user navigation.
  • Feature Highlights: Icon-based links pointing to featured product collections, trending items, or new arrivals.
  • Support and Contact: Text or icon links leading to support pages, FAQs, or contact information for customer assistance.

Overview of the Configuration Settings

  1. Font Settings:

    • Override Theme Fonts: Enable custom fonts for the section.
    • Text Font: Choose the font for the text within the section.

  2. Text Settings:

    • Text Size: Set the size of the text from 10px to 50px.

  3. Color Settings:

    • Text Color: Customize the color of the text.
    • Background Color: Define the background for the section using color or gradient.

  4. Dimensions:

    • Max Width of Section: Define the maximum width of the section.
    • Padding (Top, Bottom, Left, Right): Set the padding for the section content.

  5. Grid Settings:

    • Alignment: Set the alignment for text within the grid (center, left, right).
    • Space between Columns: Configure the gap between columns for desktop and mobile views.
    • Columns: Choose the number of columns (1-5).
    • Mobile Columns: Choose the number of columns for mobile view (1-3).

  6. Link Settings:

    • Link Background Color: Set the background color for links.
    • Link Text Color: Customize the text color for links.
    • Text Size: Set the size of the text within links from 10px to 50px.
    • Padding (Top/Bottom, Left/Right): Adjust the padding for links.
    • Link Border Radius: Set the border radius for the links.
    • Link Border Size: Define the border size for the links.
    • Link Border Color: Customize the border color of the links.
    • Subtle Shadow on Link: Add a subtle shadow effect to the links.
    • Subtle Lift Animation on Link: Enable lift animation on hover for links.
